name: Murder At The House
description:
Murder At The House is an indie, social-deducation, pixel, murder mystery game. 11 people are trapped in an old abandoned houes together, 8 are innocent, one is a detective and the other is the murderer. You, either the detective or an innocent, must interrogate all the suspects and find clues littered around the house till you think you know who the murderer is. However, if you take too long, more innocents may die..

Welcome to Murder At The House!




  • Meet 10 characters, you must interrogate 10 unique characters, each with their own personality and backstory, in order to deduce who the murder is.
  • Search for clues, around the house you will find clues that can help you solve the mystery.
  • Figure out who the murderer is, once you get enough clues, you have to try put them all together to try figure out who it is, but be sure you know certain who it is, or else you may end up arresting the wrong person.
  • Customise characters, don't want to use these characters? You can change them however you like! Customise their names and sprites and make them your own.

Gameplay


You play as either the detective or an innocent, and each time a different character has been killed. Each round you must interrogate people to gather clues to try deduce who it may be. Clues on the floor can help you. Once you know who it is, if you are innocent you must go to the detective and tell them your thoughts, or if your detective you can arrest the suspect. Be careful though, the murderer may kill more people and if you take too long, all the innocents could die and you lose..

Good luck trying to solve the Murder At The House!
